attributes.background: We would like to try and bring back coursework to the GCSE's to reduce stress for students. Also this can benefit students that struggle doing exam based work.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. Many GCSEs already include coursework, so we're not sure what more you'd like to happen. 

If you'd like to "Ban exams, instead get graded for classwork.", you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/215898

You could also start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking for all exam-based GCSE assessments to be replaced with coursework-based assessment.
